articles.title: Warriors survive Stephen Curry blunder to tie series with Kings - ESPN India
articles.description: The Warriors held on to beat the Kings 126-125 on Sunday and tie their first-round series at 2-2 after Stephen Curry called a timeout that Golden State didn't have.
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO -- Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry was trapped with 40 seconds to go in Game 3 of the series against the Sacramento Kings. He had nowhere to move and no one to pass to.
